records.QueryText: want about weather information for district ?
records.KccAns: Dear Kisan Bhai, According to the information received from the Department of Indian Meteorology Department, there is no possibility of rainfall in the next 3 days in your district. Thunderstorm with thunderstorm 6,7,8 light rainfall can occur, the temperature is 41 degree Celsius. Winds are running faster than normal The minimum temperature is 35 degrees. Monsoon has reached Monsoon in Kerala this year though North India will have to wait till the last week of June. Before coming to the monsoon, do not put any fertilizers in the field, take the advice at appropriate time and the appropriate temperature, Monsoon is expected to arrive in Madhya Pradesh on June 12-13.
